Items.Name: Basic Weapon
Items.Description: Basic type of any weapon (no modifiers)

Items.Name: Medicine
Items.Description: Heals 2d10 HP, but can only be used outside of battle

Items.Name: Dangerous Mushroom
Items.Description:
Requires a resilience roll:
-	Success: Heal 1d6 HP
-	Minor Success: Heal 1d6 HP but gain Poison
-	Fail: Gain Poison

Items.Name: Lazarus Tonic
Items.Description: Revives a fainted comrade in battle

Bestiary.Name: Armored Rhino
Bestiary.Description: A rhinoceros with a thick metal hide
Bestiary.Attacks:
Charge: 1d12 damage

Ground Stomp: 1d8 damage to 2 enemies

Bestiary.Name: Baterina
Bestiary.Description: A giant back with legs that wears a tutu

Bestiary.Name: Brown Dragon
Bestiary.Description: Dragons the size of human beings with thick brown scales
Bestiary.Attacks:
Scratch: 1d8+3 damage

Bite: 1d8 damage.  Will latch onto a character causing the following: -1 to Movement Rolls and automatic 1d4 damage until free

Dirt Tail Whip: 1d6 ranged Earth damage plus causes Blind.

Bestiary.Name: Crystal Squid
Bestiary.Attacks:
Snap: 1d10 damage to a single player

Embrace: 1d4 damage.  Traps the player who must make a move to escape

Water Jet: 1d10 damage to all players

Bestiary.Name: Dark Wolf
Bestiary.Description: A tall wolf with charcoal-like skin

Bestiary.Name: Electric Eel
Bestiary.Description: An underwater creature that shoots electricity
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bite: 1d10 damage

Shock: 1d8 Lightning damage to all enemies.  Causes Paralysis.

Bestiary.Name: Fire Scorpion
Bestiary.Description: A big scorpion that has does fire damage
Bestiary.Attacks:
Sting: 1d12 fire damage.  Causes burn.

Pinch: 1d4.  Traps the player who must make a move to escape.

Bestiary.Name: Flying Drone
Bestiary.Description: A robot in the air that can shoot an enemy

Bestiary.Name: Gunner Soldier
Bestiary.Attacks:
Gunshot: 1d10 damage to an enemy

Gun Spray: 1d4 damage to all enemies

Bestiary.Name: Magmus
Bestiary.Description: A humanoid creature made of lava rock

Bestiary.Name: Marionette
Bestiary.Description: A marionette.  A puppet on strings.

Bestiary.Name: Muskroom
Bestiary.Attacks:
Scratch: 1d4+3 damage

Bite: 1d4 damage.  Causes Poison.

Spore Cloud: Cause Poison on all enemies

Bestiary.Name: Ring of Fire
Bestiary.Description: A literal floating circle of fire

Bestiary.Name: Ring of Lightning
Bestiary.Description: A literal floating circle of electricity
Bestiary.Attacks: Lightning Strike: 1d8 Lightning damage.  Causes Paralysis.

Bestiary.Name: Rock Beast
Bestiary.Description: A humanoid creature made of dirt and rock
Bestiary.Attacks:
Rock Punch: 1d10 Earth damage

Grab: Entrap an enemy

Bestiary.Name: Skeleton Knight
Bestiary.Description: A skeleton in armor with a sword

Bestiary.Name: Snow Vixen
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bite: 1d10 damage

Scratch: 1d6 damage

Snow Beam: 1d10 Ice damage

Bestiary.Name: Waterbone
Bestiary.Description: A skeleton inside a bubble of water
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bubble Attack: 1d10 Water damage

Bone Attack: 1d12 Dark damage.

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Call of the Wild
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: Spend 1 SP to summon a Wolf to your side if in a forest.  Wolf has 4 HP and can do 1d6 damage and has its own turn during combat.

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Prosecutor
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +1 to Diplomacy when you try to convince others that someone is lying (whether it's true or not)

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Chef
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +1 to Tinker for creating a delicious meal that will restore 1d4 HP or SP

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Informed Traveller
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +1 to Knowledge roll for information about a city/town you haven't been to before

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Cavern Explorer
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +1 to Sense roll when inside a cave or cavern

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Mountain Climber
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +1 to Brawn roll for climbing mountains
